name: Integers whose binary representation contains exactly four 1's, no two 1's being adjacent.
comment: Subsequence of A003714 and of A014312.
program: while True: yield int(bin(n:=n^((a:=-n&n+1)|(a>>1)) if n&1 else ((n&~(b:=n+(a:=n&-n)))>>a.bit_length())^b)[2:].replace('1','01'),2)
author: _Chai Wah Wu_, Apr 07 2025
